trans-unit.source: Provides data for the paint events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data for paint hendelser i <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A ChartPaintEventArgs object is used to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: En ChartPaintEventArgs-objektet til å angi egenskapene for diagrammet under den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>hendelser i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A> property allows you to position chart elements, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property facilitates GDI+ drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>egenskapen kan du plassere diagramelementer, og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A>egenskapen muliggjør GDI + tegning operasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A> property gives the developer access to the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, which can be used to set various properties of the chart.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>egenskapen gir developer-tilgang til roten <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektet, som kan brukes til å angi ulike egenskaper for diagrammet.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.Chart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Chart property allows the developer to set chart properties during the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen diagrammet gjør det mulig for utviklere å angi egenskaper for diagram under den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>og <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>hendelser i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object for the event.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the chart element.
Use this object property during a painting event to: - Help with the conversion to and from relative and/or absolute chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Bruke objektet egenskapen under en malingen fullføres hendelse:-hjelpe med konverteringen til og fra relativ og/eller absolutt diagramkoordinater.

trans-unit.source: - Perform custom drawing using a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: -Utføre egendefinerte tegning ved hjelp av en GDI + <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: Use this object property during a painting event to position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen for objektet under en malingen fullføres hendelse for å plassere et diagramelement.
